trans-unit.source: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XPath 轉換數位簽章 W3C 所定義。

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigXPathTransform class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language.
trans-unit.target: XmlDsigXPathTransform 類別可讓您解決使用 XPath 語言的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用 XPath 運算式，以選取您想要簽署或加密任一密碼編譯作業中移除所有其他的 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigXPathTransform class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XmlDsigXPathTransform 類別來簽署或加密的 XML 文件使用 XPath 運算式的特定部分。

trans-unit.source: For information on initializing the XmlDsigXPathTransform class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 XmlDsigXPathTransform 類別值 XPath 轉換字串的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the XmlDsigXPathTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: 描述 XmlDsigXPathTransform 類別統一資源識別元 (URI) 由定義<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XPath 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 6.6.3 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回參數的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>都適合用來為 XMLDSIG 的子元素所包含的物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表特定轉換的內容說明目前所需的 XML 節點的清單<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>中 XMLDSIG 物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetOutput method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetOutput 方法來擷取<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件，其中包含 XPath 轉換的 XML 表示法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>型別的物件<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetOutput method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetOutput 方法來擷取<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件，其中包含 XPath 轉換的 XML 表示法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之輸出的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>是為此參數唯一有效的類型。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>型別的物件<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: type 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於有效的輸入之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的輸入類型，以<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>是<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸入類型的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件; 您可以將只有其中一個這些類型的物件傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 剖析指定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>物件做為轉換特定內容的<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目，並設定目前的內部狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件以符合<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the LoadInnerXml method to initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LoadInnerXml 方法初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>使用 XPath 轉換的類別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: To initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>使用 XPath 轉換類別中，完成下列步驟。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class and set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property to the value of an XPath transform string.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>類別並設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>XPath 轉換字串的值的屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that represents the transform.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>表示轉換的物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class and pass the previously created <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object to the LoadInnerXml method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別，並將先前建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>LoadInnerXml 方法的物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>物件載入到目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The nodeList parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The nodeList parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The nodeList parameter does not contain an element.
trans-unit.target: -或- nodeList 參數不包含項目。

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前載入指定的輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the LoadInput method to initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object to the value of an XPath transform using an <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LoadInput 方法初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>XPath 轉換使用的值物件<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: For information about initializing an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object using an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需初始化資訊<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>物件使用的 XPath 轉換字串，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入物件的類型必須是其中一個類型中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要載入到目前之輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於從可能的輸出之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>的唯一有效的輸出類型</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object; the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object return only objects of one of these types.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸出型別的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件;<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>方法在目前的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref>物件傳回的唯一物件的其中一個類型。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>
